### Offline Map for Mobile

* [Matia Island sample](avenzamaps://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/com.roblabs.yellow-dog/avenzamaps/tmp/ps/puget-sound-matia.tif), 1.6 MB.  Use to test your setup of Avenza Maps.
  * <small>[avenzamaps://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/com.roblabs.yellow-dog/avenzamaps/tmp/ps/puget-sound-matia.tif](avenzamaps://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/com.roblabs.yellow-dog/avenzamaps/tmp/ps/puget-sound-matia.tif)</small>

* [Offline Satellite Map of Puget Sound](avenzamaps://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/com.roblabs.yellow-dog/avenzamaps/tmp/ps/puget-sound-poster-216.tif), 442.3 MB.
  * <small>[avenzamaps://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/com.roblabs.yellow-dog/avenzamaps/tmp/ps/puget-sound-poster-216.tif](avenzamaps://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/com.roblabs.yellow-dog/avenzamaps/tmp/ps/puget-sound-poster-216.tif)</small>


  * [Apple App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/avenza-maps/id388424049)
    1. Open Avenza Maps
    1. If you have a link that starts with `avenzamaps://`, then the link will automatically open in Avenza Maps and the import of the map will begin.
    1. You can also manually paste in a link.
      1. On the My Maps screen, tap the Add icon ('+') to import a map.
      1. At the bottom choose "Tap to enter a URL of a Map"
      1. Paste in the link to your offline map.
    1. [iOS docs from Avenza](https://support.avenzamaps.com/hc/en-us/articles/360035432331-Importing-maps-from-custom-locations)
    1.  **Note:** The free version is limited to having three maps downloaded to the app at any one time.
  * [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Avenza)
    1. Open Avenza Maps
    1. If you have a link that starts with `avenzamaps://`, then the link will automatically open in Avenza Maps and the import of the map will begin.
    1. You can also manually paste in a link.
      1. On the My Maps screen, tap the Add icon ('+'), a round, orange button, followed by "Download or import a map".
      1. Choose the `http://` option in the section called "Import your own map"
      1. Paste in the link to your offline map.
    1. [Android docs from Avenza](https://support.avenzamaps.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034714392-Importing-maps-from-custom-locations)
    1.  **Note:** The free version is limited to having three maps downloaded to the app at any one time.
